meanings.definition: The act of dissolving or breaking apart.
meanings.sent1: The dissolutions of the sugar in water created a sweet solution.
meanings.sent2: The dissolutions of the partnership led to the closure of the business.
meanings.sent3: The dissolutions of the puzzle pieces made it impossible to complete the picture.
meanings.sent4: The dissolutions of trust between them left a bitter taste in their relationship.
meanings.sent5: The dissolutions of the clouds in the sky revealed a clear blue expanse above.

meanings.definition: The termination or ending of something.
meanings.sent1: The dissolutions of the meeting signaled the end of the discussion.
meanings.sent2: The dissolutions of the contract were finalized after months of negotiation.
meanings.sent3: The dissolutions of the movie left the audience in suspense for the sequel.
meanings.sent4: The dissolutions of the old year brought about new beginnings.
meanings.sent5: The dissolutions of the music concert marked the conclusion of a successful event.

meanings.definition: The process of disintegrating or dispersing.
meanings.sent1: The dissolutions of the sandcastle happened quickly when the tide came in.
meanings.sent2: The dissolutions of the organization began with disagreements among members.
meanings.sent3: The dissolutions of the ice cream cone left a sticky mess on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent4: The dissolutions of the fog revealed the landscape in the morning light.
meanings.sent5: The dissolutions of the crowd dispersed people in all directions after the event.
